desc: Supplying North America with unique and specialty dairy equipment and services, from colostrum pasteurizers to quota and credit sales, to custom built farm equipment and barn design.

layout.text: Providing Dairy Farmers with Unique Products and Exceptional Service since 2010!
Whether you are looking for unique products like high quality colostrum bags, milk pasteurizers, custom built dairy equipment or specialty supplies not found elsewhere, we've got you covered!
